translation.en: I'm starting to realize that the amount of money she has lost
translation.es: me doy cuenta de que el dinero que ella había perdido

translation.en: doesn't add up to the lifestyle that he's been living,
translation.es: no alcanzaba para el estilo de vida que llevaba,

translation.en: because there is an extreme amount of money that has been spent.
translation.es: no alcanzaba para el estilo de vida que llevaba, porque la cantidad de dinero que gastaba era extrema.

translation.en: Peter.
translation.es: Peter.

translation.en: Good morning, love. How are you? I love you. I miss you.

translation.en: He texted me, I'm tired as fuck. Yeah, of course.

translation.en: A few years ago, I was followed by two guys and they beat me up.

translation.en: My heart almost stopped beating, because I also lent him money.

translation.en: It started off small.

translation.en: The cheating part, the money part.

translation.en: …an enjoyable flight. Thank you for flying with us, and have a pleasant evening.

translation.es: para inventar este artículo.

translation.en: I knew I was defrauded. I knew that he was fake.

translation.en: - I love you. I care about you-- -

translation.es: Dijeron que necesitaban tiempo para armar el caso,

translation.en: but it was something I didn't have,
translation.es: pero era algo que yo no tenía

translation.en: because I knew that Simon was a fugitive.
translation.es: porque sabía que Simon era un fugitivo.

translation.en: The moment he was able to get away, he would.
translation.es: En cuanto pudiera escapar, lo haría.

translation.en: I didn't want him to get away with this.
translation.es: No quería que se saliera con la suya.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to someone who was in the article.
translation.es: Quería hablar con alguien que estuviera en el artículo.

translation.en: I found Pernilla on Instagram.
translation.es: Encontré a Pernilla en Instagram.

translation.en: So I get a message from this Dutch girl, Ayleen,
translation.es: Recibí un mensaje de una chica holandesa, Ayleen,

translation.en: saying that she's the girlfriend of Simon,
translation.es: diciendo que era la novia de Simon.

translation.en: Hi.
translation.es: Hola.

translation.es: Ayleen dijo que nos ayudaría a atraparlo,

translation.en: but there's something she needs to do first.

translation.en: I needed to get my money back. But how? I had to come up with a plan.
translation.es: Necesitaba recuperar mi dinero. Pero ¿cómo? Tenía que idear un plan.

translation.en: Suddenly I realized I was in a quite powerful position.
translation.es: De repente, me di cuenta de que estaba en una posición poderosa.

translation.en: He wasn't able to get any women on Tinder anymore
translation.es: Ya no podía conseguir mujeres en Tinder

translation.en: because his face was all over Google.
translation.es: porque su cara aparecía en Google.

translation.es: Estaba escondido en Praga

translation.en: and he had absolutely nowhere else to go besides me.

translation.en: He always told me keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
translation.es: Siempre decía que mantuviera a mis amigos cerca y a mis enemigos más cerca.

translation.en: To make him believe I was still on his side,
translation.es: Para que creyera que seguía de su lado,

translation.en: I told him I still love him, that I believed everything he said.
translation.es: le dije que aún lo amaba, que le creía todo lo que decía.

translation.en: I even called these girls bitches.
translation.es: Incluso las llamé perras.

translation.en: I'm texting Simon all the time,
translation.es: Le escribía a Simon todo el tiempo.

translation.en: saying, Good morning, love. How are you?
translation.es: Le decía: Buenos días, amor. ¿Cómo estás? Buenas noches. Duerme bien. Te amo.

translation.en: Good night. Sleep well. I love you. I miss you.
translation.es: Le decía: Buenos días, amor. ¿Cómo estás? Buenas noches. Duerme bien. Te amo. Te extraño.

translation.en: And he keeps on telling me, and, of course, it's Simon,
translation.es: Y seguía diciéndome, por supuesto, porque es Simon,

translation.en: that he needed money to escape from his enemies.
translation.es: que necesitaba dinero para escapar de sus enemigos.

translation.en: He needed fake passports.
translation.es: Necesitaba pasaportes falsos.

translation.en: He wanted me to pawn my car.
translation.es: Quería que empeñara mi auto.

translation.en: He wanted me to sell my house.
translation.es: Quería que vendiera mi casa.

translation.en: That's when I got my idea. I was going to swindle the Tinder Swindler.
translation.es: Ahí se me ocurrió mi idea. Iba a estafar al estafador de Tinder.

translation.en: Simon only wears designer clothes. He's covered in it.
translation.es: Simon solo usaba ropa de diseñador. Tenía mucha ropa.

translation.en: Versace, Gucci, Louis Vuitton, Dolce & Gabbana.
translation.es: Versace, Gucci, Louis Vuitton, Dolce & Gabbana.

translation.en: I work in the luxury fashion industry,
translation.es: Trabajo en la industria de la moda de lujo

translation.en: so I know his wardrobe is worth a fortune.
translation.es: así que sabía que su guardarropa valía una fortuna.

translation.en: I said to him, Please, let me sell those clothes for you so we can generate some money.
translation.es: Le dije: Déjame venderte esa ropa para que tengamos algo de dinero.

translation.en: Simon has all of these clothes with him.
translation.es: Simon lleva toda esta ropa con él.

translation.en: I needed to go to Prague.

translation.en: Before I leave Amsterdam, Simon had a credit card delivered to me.
translation.es: Antes de irme de Ámsterdam, Simon me mandó una tarjeta de crédito.

translation.es: Decía: David Sharon.

translation.en: I take a picture and send it to the police,

translation.en: His address was in the middle of nowhere.
translation.es: Su casa estaba en el medio de la nada.

translation.en: As I'm getting closer, my heart is pounding.
translation.es: A medida que me acerco, mi corazón late con fuerza.

translation.en: I thought, Oh, my God, how can I come up with such a stupid plan?

translation.en: Because now I need to face him.

translation.en: He's not my boyfriend. He's not the son of Lev Leviev.
translation.es: No es mi novio. No es hijo de Lev Leviev.

translation.en: He's not working for LLD Diamonds.
translation.es: No trabaja para LLD Diamonds.

translation.en: He is a fraud,
translation.es: Es un fraude

translation.en: and I have absolutely no idea what he's capable of.
translation.es: y no tengo idea de lo que es capaz.

translation.en: He was already standing outside waiting for me,

translation.en: and he hugged me and he kissed me on the lips,

translation.en: and I felt disgusting.

translation.en: I was so angry and I wanted to scream,

translation.en: but the only thing I said was, I love you and I missed you.
translation.es: pero lo único que dije fue: Te amo y te extrañé.

translation.en: He made an appointment in the center of Prague,
translation.es: Tenía una cita en el centro de Praga

translation.en: and he wanted me to come along with him.
translation.es: y quería que lo acompañara.

translation.en: We stopped outside this head office of a plastic surgeon.

translation.en: I was like, Oh, my God, what are we going to do here?

translation.en: He wanted to change his cheekbones, his nose, his lips, maybe his chin,

translation.es: y el cirujano plástico dijo:

translation.es: Lo siento, pero no puedo hacer esa cirugía,

translation.es: porque solo los criminales quieren eso.

translation.en: I almost spit out my water

translation.en: because I really wanted to say to this surgeon,
translation.es: porque quería decirle al cirujano:

translation.en: As I'm watching this pathetic man crying for not getting his plastic surgery,
translation.es: Mientras miraba a este hombre patético llorar por no conseguir esa cirugía,

translation.en: I thought,
translation.es: pensé:

translation.en: If you weren't such… a piece of shit, I would feel sorry for you.

translation.en: But then I needed to still sleep next to him.

translation.en: He didn't make any move, thank God, but I was just in bed, frozen,

translation.es: mirando el techo toda la noche.

translation.en: Morning finally comes, I pack up three massive suitcases.

translation.en: Simon didn't even help me with it.

translation.en: Dear Ayleen, well, as you know, this is the most difficult time of my life,

translation.en: You are the woman of my dreams, and I want to build a future together.

translation.en: To marry you will be an honor for me.
translation.es: Casarme contigo será un honor para mí.

translation.en: And to make a family with kids together, you are the woman I see it with.
translation.es: Quiero que seas la mujer con la que pueda formar una familia.

translation.en: You've got to help me with everything you can.

translation.en: It's for you, for your parents, for our future. I'm worth it.
translation.es: Es para ti, para tus padres, para nuestro futuro. Yo me lo merezco.

translation.en: Now it's time to do the impossible possible.
translation.es: Es hora de hacer lo imposible.

translation.en: I'm blessed to have a woman like you in my life

translation.en: to live in happy ever after.
translation.es: para vivir feliz por siempre.

translation.en: I love you like I never loved before.
translation.es: Te amo como nunca en mi vida.

translation.en: I trust you.
translation.es: Confío en ti.

translation.en: Don't give up.
translation.es: No renuncies.

translation.en: Love you forever, yours, Simon.
translation.es: Te amaré para siempre, tuyo, Simon.

translation.en: Just a piece of shit.
translation.es: Una mierda.

translation.en: I'm on Operation Sell, Sell, Sell.
translation.es: Me concentro en vender y vender.

translation.en: Simon is texting and calling me all the time.
translation.es: Simon me escribe y me llama todo el tiempo.

translation.en: What have you sold? Where's my money? You need to be quick.

translation.en: I keep on telling him I haven't sold anything.

translation.es: Acabo de recibir una notificación de una oferta por un artículo de Simon.

translation.en: Speaking of the Devil.

translation.es: Sí, sigo vendiendo sus cosas.

translation.en: Another day, another day. Are you trying to buy time?

translation.en: You're dragging it over three fucking weeks. It doesn't take three weeks.
translation.es: Vas más de tres malditas semanas. No lleva ese tiempo.

translation.en: After a few weeks, he knows that I was keeping the money for myself.
translation.es: Después de unas semanas, sabe que me estaba quedando con el dinero.

translation.en: That's when he turned around completely.
translation.es: Y ahí fue cuando cambió por completo.

translation.en: You stop playing game with me now! Stop!
translation.es: ¡Deja de jugar conmigo ahora! ¡Basta!

translation.en: He bombs me with all these messages, and they were so aggressive.

translation.en: If you're active, listen to me! You're gonna give it today.

translation.en: You don't know where the fuck you're going.

translation.en: Voice memos of, like, 20 minutes.
translation.es: Audios de 20 minutos.

translation.en: I'm sorry about what I said, but that's it.
translation.es: Lamento lo que dije. Ya está.

translation.en: But you're taking the piss out of me.
translation.es: Pero me estás tomando el pelo.

translation.en: This is where I saw his several personalities.

translation.en: I love you and I care about you. I ask a thousand fucking times.
translation.es: Te amo y me importas. Te lo pedí mil veces.

translation.en: I ask nicely. I'm speaking to you nicely.

translation.en: I try to respect you, but it's like you're fucking with me.

translation.en: You have no idea how much I love you. You just need to trust me one last time.
translation.es: No tienes idea de cuánto te amo. Confía en mí una última vez.

translation.en: I need an answer tomorrow. Believe in me. Have a leap of faith for one time. Do it.
translation.es: Necesito una respuesta mañana. Cree en mí. Ten un poco de fe. Hazlo.

translation.en: Don't send me lies. I know how to lie. I can teach you how to lie.
translation.es: No me digas mentiras. Sé mentir. Puedo enseñarte a mentir.

translation.en: I need this money to succeed.
translation.es: Necesito este dinero para lograrlo.

translation.en: Help me out here. I don't have nobody else. I have only you.
translation.es: Ayúdame. No tengo a nadie más. Solo te tengo a ti.

translation.en: I'm begging from you, please.
translation.es: Te lo ruego, por favor.

translation.en: I give you advice. Choose it!

translation.en: You disappear. Nobody can see your messages. I'm not your enemy. I'm not fighting you.
translation.es: Desapareces. No lees mensajes. No soy tu enemigo. No estoy peleando.

translation.en: And you will get the worst fucking enemy you have ever seen in your life
translation.es: ¡Seré el peor enemigo que hayas visto en tu vida

translation.en: for you and for your fucking family if you will ever play with me!
translation.es: para ti y tu maldita familia, si sigues jugando conmigo!

translation.en: Give it today.
translation.es: Dámelo hoy.

translation.en: Look, Ayleen, I'm sorry about everything.
translation.es: Mira, Ayleen, lo lamento por todo.

translation.en: I give you the last fucking warning! Today. You want war?
translation.es: ¡Es la última advertencia! Hoy. ¿Quieres guerra?

translation.en: You will get fucking war! You will get fucking war!
translation.es: ¡Tendrás una maldita guerra!

translation.en: It was a horrible experience.
translation.es: Fue una experiencia horrible.

translation.en: But part of me was actually enjoying seeing him swerm.
translation.es: Pero una parte de mí disfrutaba verlo revolverse.

translation.en: Squirm. No.
translation.es: Perdón, retorcerse.

translation.en: Ayleen, can I ask you a favor?
translation.es: Ayleen, ¿puedo pedirte un favor?

translation.en: Can you put me one lottery ticket with numbers that I can choose?

translation.en: How pathetic can you be? I thought you were a billionaire.
translation.es: ¿Qué tan patético puedes ser? Creí que eras multimillonario.

translation.es: No tenía dinero. No tenía a quién acudir.

translation.es: Incluso me envió fotos y mensajes

translation.en: that he was eating leftovers in a shopping mall.
translation.es: de que estaba comiendo sobras en un centro comercial.

translation.es: Se dejó crecer la barba.

translation.en: He was sleeping in hostels of $12 a night.
translation.es: Dormía en hostales de 12 dólares la noche.

translation.en: At this moment, I see the real Simon,
translation.es: En ese momento, veo al verdadero Simon,

translation.en: because without other people's money, he was nobody, and he's nothing.
translation.es: porque sin el dinero de otros, no era nadie y no es nada.

translation.en: He even called himself the homeless king.
translation.es: Hasta se hacía llamar el rey sin hogar.

translation.en: The prince of diamonds to this homeless king.
translation.es: De príncipe de los diamantes a rey sin hogar.

translation.en: Cry me a river.
translation.es: Llora lo que quieras.

translation.en: One morning, I get a text from him.
translation.es: Una mañana, recibí un mensaje de él.

translation.en: A few weeks before, he was just mentioning he wanted to go to Greece.
translation.es: Unas semanas antes, había mencionado que quería ir a Grecia.

translation.en: When I text him back, my message wasn't receiving.
translation.es: Cuando le respondí, mi mensaje no le llegaba.

translation.en: I just saw one tick.
translation.es: Solo había un tick.

translation.en: That's when I realized that he was on a flight,
translation.es: Entonces supuse que estaba en un vuelo,

translation.en: because Simon is always on his phone.
translation.es: porque él siempre está con el teléfono.

translation.en: I'm searching for flights from Prague to Athens.
translation.es: Busco vuelos de Praga a Atenas.

translation.en: I found a flight exactly the same time as he went offline.
translation.es: Encontré un vuelo justo en el horario que él se desconectó.

translation.en: I took a screenshot of the details, and I sent it directly to the police.
translation.es: Tomé una captura de pantalla de los datos y la envié a la policía.

translation.en: He wouldn't travel under Simon Leviev because he was wanted for fraud.
translation.es: No viajaría como Simon Leviev porque lo buscaban por fraude.

translation.en: I also make sure they had the name that I saw on the credit card, David Sharon.
translation.es: Me aseguré de que tuvieran el nombre que vi en la tarjeta, David Sharon.

translation.en: Now, it was in the hands of the police.
translation.es: Ahora estaba en manos de la policía.

translation.en: It was one of the best moments of my life.
translation.es: Fue uno de los mejores días de mi vida.

translation.en: He even says…
translation.es: Hasta me dice…

translation.en: He got arrested by Interpol on a fake passport,
translation.es: Fue arrestado por Interpol por llevar un pasaporte falso,

translation.en: under the name David Sharon.
translation.es: bajo el nombre David Sharon.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: Ayleen tells me, We got him!
translation.es: Ayleen me dice: Lo atrapamos.

translation.en: I just wanted to call Cecilie.
translation.es: Solo quería llamar a Cecilie.

translation.en: I was like, Are you fucking kidding me? He's really caught? Now? Today?
translation.es: Le dije: ¿En serio? ¿Realmente lo atraparon? ¿Ahora? ¿Hoy?.

translation.en: I can't even describe the joy it is.
translation.es: No se imaginan la alegría.

translation.en: This is what I wanted. I wanted to see him in handcuffs.
translation.es: Esto es lo que quería. Quería verlo esposado.

translation.en: I needed justice for myself.
translation.es: Necesitaba justicia para mí.

translation.en: Does he know you gave that information to the police?
translation.es: ¿Sabe que tú le informaste a la policía?

translation.en: No. He never believed that I was capable of doing this.
translation.es: No. Nunca creyó que yo fuera capaz de hacerlo.

translation.en: He knows now.
translation.es: Ahora lo sabe.

translation.en: Hi, Simon.
translation.es: Hola, Simon.

translation.en: Everything that we did did have an effect.
translation.es: Todo lo que hicimos tuvo un efecto.

translation.en: We helped at least one person,
translation.es: Ayudamos al menos a una persona

translation.en: and we did get him arrested.
translation.es: y logramos que lo arrestaran.

translation.en: Maybe not for everything that we wanted, but he did get arrested.
translation.es: Quizá no por todo lo que queríamos, pero lo arrestaron.

translation.en: So our action had a reaction.
translation.es: Así que nuestra acción tuvo una reacción.

translation.en: Just got my new iPhone 12 Pro. Just received the new shoes. Perfect.
translation.es: Acabo de comprar mi nuevo iPhone 12 Pro. Acabo de recibir mis zapatillas nuevas. Perfectas.

translation.en: This is the real deal. The Bentley or the Ferrari.
translation.es: Esto es lo máximo. El Bentley o el Ferrari.

translation.en: I wish you a great and magnificent evening.
translation.es: Les deseo una gran y magnífica velada.

translation.en: I will proceed with the lawsuit against you for defam- in- ation and lies
translation.es: Procederé con la demanda en su contra por difamación y mentiras.

translation.en: and, you know, that everything is based, basically, on a lie.
translation.es: Todo se basa en una mentira.

translation.en: And that's it, this is how it's gonna be.
translation.es: Eso es todo y así será.

translation.en: Have you been on Tinder since? Yes. Oh, tons. Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - ¿Estuviste en Tinder desde entonces? - Sí. Sigo. Todos me lo preguntan.

translation.en: Everyone is asking me. Tinder has nothing to do with this.
translation.es: Tinder no tiene nada que ver con esto.

translation.en: I was on Tinder immediately.
translation.es: Volví a Tinder de inmediato.

translation.en: - You're still looking for love? - I'm still looking for love. So…
translation.es: - ¿Aún buscas al amor? - Sigo buscando al amor. Así que…

translation.en: Always.
translation.es: Siempre.
